message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $130. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $130 is a good starting point, but I'm looking to spend closer to $125.  Would you be willing to come down a bit?

Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to spend closer to $125, but I'm not willing to go that low just yet. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $127.5. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
